$evidence.description: A path to the evidence JSON with data needed to verify the asset.

$schema.description: A path to JSON Schema definition file.

title.description: A short natural-language name for the asset, as defined by https://iptc.org/std/ninjs/ninjs-schema_1.2.json

byline.description: The name(s) of the creator(s) of the content of the asset, as defined by https://iptc.org/std/ninjs/ninjs-schema_1.2.json

headline.description: A brief introduction to the content of the asset, as defined by https://iptc.org/std/ninjs/ninjs-schema_1.2.json

versioncreated.description: The date and time when this version of the asset was created, as defined by https://iptc.org/std/ninjs/ninjs-schema_1.2.json

uri.description: A valid URI pointing to a resource representing the asset to which this digital asset represents.

located.description: The name of the location from which the content of the asset originates, as defined by https://iptc.org/std/ninjs/ninjs-schema_1.2.json

body_text.description: The textual content of the asset, as defined by https://iptc.org/std/ninjs/ninjs-schema_1.2.json
